description: Google is changing the way its popular search feature works, feeding users AI-generated replies to their questions rather than directing them to other websites. The Post's AI reporter Gerrit De Vynck says it could change the internet forever.
title: The end of Google search as we know it

description: Crafted by a bipartisan group of Senators, the “road map” reviews AI’s impact on the military, health care and workers and could be released as soon as Tuesday.
title: Schumer’s long-awaited AI ‘road map’ is coming this week. It will cost billions.

description: In a letter sent Friday, Air Force Assistant Secretary Frank Calvelli bluntly said he was growing “concerned” with the development of the United Launch Alliance’s Vulcan rocket.
title: Pentagon worried its primary satellite launcher can’t keep pace

description: Microsoft and Google are bringing chatty AI-powered search results to the masses, but you can get better results today with these tricks.
title: Don’t wait for AI search. Get better results with what you have now.

description: The tech giant is rolling out AI-generated answers that displace links to human-written websites
title: Web publishers brace for carnage as Google adds AI answers
